subject: Re: How to test private member variables?
msgSnippet: ...  ... True.  I seldom need to test sequence... but sometimes it s part of the behaviour... sometimes the interaction with the mocked component needs
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:
<snip>

> More to the point, though, I try to avoid checking for correct call
> sequencing, because that tests implementation and not necessarily
> behavior.

True. I seldom need to test sequence... but sometimes it's part of
the behaviour... sometimes the interaction with the mocked component
needs to be sequenced in a particular way. If the sequence is an
explicit part of the behaviour, then it should/must be tested.

Dave
